item.description:
2011 Winter Film Series: "Forks Over Knives" Screening
Location: Museum of Science, Cahners Theater, 1 Science Park, Boston

Cost for reserving a spot for the afternoon is a $5 donation to Slow Food Boston. There WILL be day of walk-in spots available free of charge on the chance that pre-registration doesn't fill up. They'd appreciate your donation, but feel free to take your chances as well!


When: Sunday, 02/13/2011 2:30PM $5 per person.
Reserve at: http://www.slowfoodbo...
3rd event on page.

2011 Winter Film Series

Diabetes. Heart Disease. Obesity. What is going on in our
society? Why are we so sick? The next film in our 2011 series
explores these issues, and even tries to make some
recommendations for what we can do to stop sliding down this
slippery slope of illness.

An eye-opening documentary about correlation between human diets
and diet-related lifestyle-related diseases so prevalent in our
society today and escalate the national burden of disease here
in America.

More information and directions can be found on the Museum's
website.
http://www.MOS.org...

Following the film - we will plan on walking over to the North End to eat. Let's make good food choices from the fabulous restaurants there! (Kindly indicate on your rsvp if you plan on joining us to eat.)

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Science Museum Screening - "Forks Over Knives:
